title: Apparently I'm going to miss the holiday content....
body:
Tried to patch up my LoL and hop into the fun recently. Can't..... patcher just bugs up. I tried everything i could find on the support boards and reddit. No dice..... So I sent in a request ticket with my logs. and it's been a day and a half and i've not heard anything.

Getting board,
Wingsmash

replies.body: If you put in a ticket then our tech team can help you out!  In the meantime, if you want to provide more details on what exactly is happening specifically, I'd like to try and help!  Otherwise, we'll respond to your ticket asap so you can play and get in on the Teemoing.

Thanks,

Wednesday (10/26/2016) I decided to get back into LoL and opened up the patcher to let it do its work. I come back later and it shows an error (in the background i see it is at 99%). I retry and.... no dice. So i look up on the internet various ways around this and try a few things such as deleting the folder with my saved item sets. Still no dice...... I uninstall LoL and obliterate any trace of it on my pc, then re-download and install. Still no dice... I run as administrator.... still no dice. I tell the patcher to repair itself and the game..... Still no dice. So now i humbly submit my logs to you in the distant hope that you can get back to me with a solution. If not.... back to WoW.
P.S. I followed the forum post you guys stuck to the front of the support page. no dice. turned off firewall, don't have any other anti virus software.

I realized that the error occurs early in the percentage but the bar keeps proceeding towards 99% in the background so if i come back a while later it'll be at 99%. It does not go further than 99% once it gets there. Sat and watched it for 10 minutes to see exactly where it goofs up and i find it's at 34% (at least the time watched it).

Edit: Uninstalled the game. Reinstalled. It hitched at 81 or 82%.

Based on the details here, it sounds like you're having a poor connection problem, so the patcher isn't able to finish downloading necessary updates.  When it gets stuck at areas like 99%, it's trying to go back and download files that it's missed during the process.  I recommend going over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help.  Sorry for the delay in getting back to you, and hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FxIY9nAi,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-01T15:33:01.590+0000)
>
> Based on the details here, it sounds like you're having a poor connection problem, so the patcher isn't able to finish downloading necessary updates.  When it gets stuck at areas like 99%, it's trying to go back and download files that it's missed during the process.  I recommend going over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help.  Sorry for the delay in getting back to you, and hope that helps!

is there a reason you don't have an option to just download full patches (or full, up-to-date installs) as a zip file to prevent an issue like this?

With a proper download manager, if the download failed you could just "resume" from where you left off, rather than having a completely corrupt installation.

It would also download faster since you wouldn't be limited to like 100ms between every small file (ping delay) since it's one large file.
You may want to check your Proxy settings on your computer, if you are using one
didn't do it, but thanks for the idea
